TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_qwalax, title = qwalax, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/qwalax} }

S.FORM: qwalax hya' ga hway bniq babaw rhzyal na yaba' utux kayal, mwah prkyas squ qqhuniq, kk'man, kwara pinbahu, ru miq qsya' ita', nanu yasa qu maki' nniqun ta' ru nnbun ta', thuzyay ta' minblaq mqyanux ru mlahang kinbahan. kinbkesan 'tayal hiya' ga skita' naha squ kinkrahu' na qwalax ru kya qu pinspngan naha, ru ini' ptnaq sinllwan naha lalu' na qwalax,smsmun ga, ki'a spayat qu lalu' nya. smn'iyal: 下大雨 krahu' ru khmay qwalax nya' mshayhway: 下小雨 cikuy ru thayhway qwalax nya' smyawkay: 絲絲細雨 zkhi' ru lhmiq qwalax nya', yan yawkay === smgiqu': 毛毛雨 yan giqu' kincipuq ru lhbaw qwalax nya' ===

qwalax hya' ga hway bniq babaw rhzyal na yaba' otox kayal, mwah prkyas sqo qqhoniq, kk'man, kwara pinbaho, ro miq qsya' ita', nano yasa qo maki' nniqon ta' ro nnbon ta', thozyay ta' minblaq mqyanox ro mlahang kinbahan. kinbkesan 'tayal hiya' ga skita' naha sqo kinkraho' na qwalax ro kya qo pinspngan naha, ro ini' ptnaq sinllwan naha lalo' na qwalax,smsmon ga, ki'a spayat qo lalo' nya. smn'iyal: 下大雨 kraho' ro khmay qwalax nya' mshayhway: 下小雨 cikoy ro thayhway qwalax nya' smyawkay: 絲絲細雨 zkhi' ro lhmiq qwalax nya', yan yawkay === smgiqo': 毛毛雨 yan giqo' kincipoq ro lhbaw qwalax nya' ===
